disagreement.title: Your consent is required in order to open an account
disagreement.detail: Take your time. If you prefer to meet in person, please visit one of our branches.

cantProceed.title: Our apologies, but we ar unable to open an account for you online.

welcomeBack.title: Welcome back to Moneta
welcomeBack.detail:
After reviewing your information it seems that you are an existing client.

Please activate the Smart Banka app in your internet banking.

Tom Plus Account free of charge and hidden terms can be activated by switching your existing account or opening a new account when you log in.
welcomeBack.secondaryButton: I don't have my login details

welcomeBackForgotten.title: Did you forget your login details?
welcomeBackForgotten.detail:
Call our Helpline and we will send them via email after a quick verification.

Alternatively, visit one of our branches.

intro.title: In the next step we will verify your identity

bullets.title: Scan your ID card
bullets.description: Take a picture of both sides of your valid ID card.

bullets.title: Scan second ID document
bullets.description: Take a photo of your valid driver's license or passport. Front side only.

bullets.title: Identity Verification
bullets.description: In the last step we will verify that you are not being impersonated by someone else.

info.idFrontTitle: Take a photo of the front side of your ID card
info.idBackTitle: Take a photo of the back side of your ID card
info.drivingLicenceTitle: Take a photo of the front side of your driver's license
info.passportLicenceTitle: Take a photo of the front side of your passport
info.detail: Make sure that you are taking a photo of

bullets.title: the right side of a valid document in landscape mode
under good lighting, legible and without glare.

takePhoto.idFrontTitle: Front side of the ID card
takePhoto.idBackTitle: Back side of the ID card
takePhoto.drivingLicenceTitle: Front side of the driver's license

upload.title: Processing uploaded document, just a moment

wrongDocument.title: We could not process data from your ID document. Please try taking another photo.
wrongDocument.detail: Make sure that it is the correct (Czech) document, that it is all in frame and the details are legible.

scanFailed.title: We could not process the data from your document.
scanFailed.detail: Please review it in the next step.

permissionErrorScreen.title: The app requires access
permissionErrorScreen.detail:
To verify your identity, we will need to take a photo of your IDs, please allow Smart Banka access to your camera in Settings.

Alternatively, you can bring your IDs in person to one of our branches.

onboardingDocumentUpload.detail: Make sure that you are taking a photo of

bullets.title: the right side of a valid document in landscape mode
under good lighting, legible and without glare

onboardingDocumentUpload.inProgress: Processing the uploaded document, <b>just a moment/b>
onboardingDocumentUpload.idFrontTitle: Front side of the ID card
onboardingDocumentUpload.idBackTitle: Back side of the ID card
onboardingDocumentUpload.drivingLicenceTitle: Front side of the driver's license

wrongDocument.title: We could not process data from your ID document. Please try taking another photo
wrongDocument.detail: Make sure that it is the correct (Czech) document, that it is all in frame and the details are legible.

scanFailed.title: We could not process the data from your document.
scanFailed.detail: Please review it in the next step.

permissionErrorScreen.title: The app requires access
permissionErrorScreen.detail:
To verify your identity, we will need to take a photo of your IDs, please allow Smart Banka access to your camera in Settings.

Alternatively, you can bring your IDs in person to one of our branches.

onboardingDocumentReview.title: Is this information correct?
onboardingDocumentReview.detail: By clicking Continue, you confirm that all the information provided is correct, factual and up-to-date..

secondDocumentTypeSelection.title: Take a photo of your other ID
secondDocumentTypeSelection.detail: Your ID card has been verified, Choose a second form of ID to verify your identity.

liveness.title: In the last step we will verify your identity via a quick video

bullets.title: Now we will take a short video of your face.
bullets.detail: In order to make sure you are not being impersonated.

bullets.title: Simple gestures (moving your head to the left, to the right and smiling) provide the best possible verification.
Your privacy and security is paramount - the video serves only as identity verification.

error.title: Our apologies, an error occurred while uploading the video.

liveness.demo: Watch the sample to see what to expect.
liveness.faceInCenter: Is your face well-lit and in focus?
liveness.turnBack: Great job! Now, turn your head to the side and back:

livenessVerification.title: Oscar-worthy performance! Thank you. The video will be processed within 5 minutes.
livenessVerification.detail: The recorded video will be compared with your documents to confirm your identity.

onboardingContactAddress.title: What is your contact address? The app comes with a current account with a card free of charge and hidden terms.

cardOptions.title: Virtual card on your smartphone
cardOptions.detail: Instead of a plastic card, you will be issued a virtual card. To use it for payments and ATM withdrawals add it to your smartphone wallet.

cardOptions.title: Physical plastic card
cardOptions.detail: A regular card you know it. It can also be added to your smartphone.

cardDesign.title: Select the design of your new card

designs.title: Moneta Standard - Ústí nad Labem Region

click2Pay.title: Click to Pay has been enabled for your card on the e-shop
click2Pay.detail: Whenever you see the Click to Pay logo {0} while shopping, you can easily pay by entering your email. Your card details are securely stored in the Click to Pay system, which the merchant does not have access to. By proceeding, you agree to the terms of service, which will also be saved in your Documents. You can deactivate this service anytime in Smart Banka.
click2Pay.emailInfo: If you have multiple cards linked to one email, you can always choose which one to use.
click2Pay.emailError: We don't have your e-mail in contact information. Set it up in Settings.

onboardingMatchId.title: The details on your IDs do not match
onboardingMatchId.detail: Select or enter the correct information

amlQuestionnaire.title: Information Required by Law
amlQuestionnaire.detail: ZThis information is required under Act No. 253/2008 Coll. on Anti-Money Laundering.
amlQuestionnaire.wrongTaxResidenceDialogText: We're sorry, if you truly are a tax resident of another country, you will not be able to open an account online. PLease visit one of our branches where we will be happy to assist you.

depositOrigin.text: What is the main source of the funds in the current account?

options.text: Income from family members / Winnings / Gifts.

prevailingTransactions.text: Which types of transactions will be most frequent on your current account?

options.text: Cashless - foreign, outside of the EU

rangeOfSalary.text: What is the expected monthly income for the current account?

taxResidence.text: Is the CR your only tax residence?

pep.text: Are you a politically exposed person?
pep.info: A politically exposed person is an individual who holds a prominent public position or role in a government body or international organization, either in the Czech Republic or abroad (e.g., Prime Minister, Member of Parliament, prominent head of local government, judge of the Supreme or Constitutional Court, member of the Central Bank's bank board, senior officer of the armed forces). A politically exposed person is also any: 1) member of immediate family of said person (e.g., parent, child, sibling, spouse), 2) Partner or the beneficial owner of the same legal person or trust fund as said person or a person who has any other close business relationship with said person, 3) Beneficiary owner of a legal person or a trust fund created on behalf or for the benefit of said person.

pepReason.info: State the position (or relationship to another person) that makes you a politically exposed person (for example, 'I am a judge of the Constitutional Court' or 'I am the spouse of the mayor of Plzeň')

bankId.info: BankID provides a simple way to access government and private services. It is free to use.

pepInfo.label: Who is a politically exposed person
pepInfo.title: Politically exposed person
pepInfo.detail: A politically exposed person is an individual who holds a prominent public position or role in a government body or international organization, either in the Czech Republic or abroad.
pepInfo.subdetail: E.g., Prime Minister, Member of Parliament, prominent head of local government, judge of the Supreme or Constitutional Court, member of the Central Bank's bank board, senior officer of the armed forces etc.
pepInfo.sectionTitle: A politically exposed person is also any:
bullets: Member of immediate family of said person (e.g., parent, child, sibling, spouse)
Partner or the beneficial owner ofm the same legal person or trust fund as said person or a person who has any other close business relationship with said person
Beneficiary owner of a legal person or a trust fund created on behalf or for the benefit of said person

amlQuestionnaire.taxResidenceInfoBody: We kindly request information from you for the purpose of complying with the Common Standard for Due Diligence regarding financial account information, for the purpose of exchanging information provided by financial institutions with tax authorities under the Multilateral Competent Authority Agreement on the Automatic Exchange of Financial Account Information (for banks, this concerns current accounts, savings accounts, and term deposits)

staticDocuments.title: Review these documents before signing the Agreement
staticDocuments.subtitle: All documents can be found in Smart Banka under 'Documents'.

waitingBeforePrecontract.title: Just a moment, preparing pre-contractual information

unsuported.title: Welcome back to Moneta
unsuported.detail:
We are glad you chose to use the Tom Plus Account and Smart Banka. Due to technical difficulties, we are unable to open your account online.

Visit one of our branches, where we will be happy to help you. Please remember to bring with you a valid form of ID. Thank you.

withSB.title: Welcome back to Moneta. We're activating your Smart Banka.
withSB.detail: It usually takes just a few minutes, in rare cases it can take until the next day.

waiting.title: We're still working on it. You can leave the app and come back later.

noSB.title: Welcome back to Moneta
noSB.detail:
We will set up your Smart Banka now. It should only take a couple of minutes and it will be ready to be used right away.

Tom Plus Account free of charge and hidden terms can be activated by switching your current account or opening a new one when you log in to Smart Banka.

consent.title: Review the parameters of Smart Banka
consent.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka under 'Documents'

victory.title: Welcome back to Moneta. Everything is ready!
victory.detail: Log in to confirm the activation of Smart Banka.

victory.title: Done!
victory.detail: Thank you for verifying. We will now process your information.
